title: Genetic Engineering - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/31/19
itunes:title: Genetic Engineering - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/31/19
description:
George Noory and scientific writer Peter Ward explore his research into CRISPR DNA sequences to modify and improve human performance and create superior soldiers for the battlefield.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
